title: Alex Evenings Women's Long A-line Sweetheart Neck Dress (Petite and Regular Sizes)
description: Elegant Mother of the Bride Dress: Long A-line gown with a sweetheart neckline and cascade side skirt, perfect for weddings, formal events, and galas.
Beaded Illusion Sleeves & Neckline: This standout design adds sparkle and sophistication, ideal for special occasions or evening parties.
Comfort Meets Style: Featuring 3/4 illusion sleeves and a concealed back zip, this dress offers ease of wear and a flawless fit for any formal setting.
Timeless A-line Silhouette: A flattering choice for mothers of the bride, evening celebrations, or upscale gatherings, crafted to elevate your wardrobe.

Sizes for Every Woman: At Alex Evenings, we embrace the beauty of every woman. Our inclusive sizing, from Petite to Regular, and Plus sizes, ensures that our dresses are designed to complement various body types.
Our stunning evening gown with beaded illusion sleeves and neckline is a perfect dress for a mother of the bride or guest of wedding.
